definitions.definition: Conforming to, or recognised by the laws of society.
examples: Lawful money is always a land asset and can only be issued by an actual land jurisdiction government — not a corporation.

definitions.definition: Operating according to some law or fundamental principle.
Of a character : having an alignment which makes them tend to follow the laws and conventions of society .

main_definition: ( law ) Conforming to, or recognised by the laws of society.
secondary_definitions: Operating according to some law or fundamental principle.
( roleplaying games ) Of a character : having an alignment which makes them tend to follow the laws and conventions of society .
